War Fan Tasm offers a variety of prizes depending on the level of achievement. The bigger the challenge, the better
the prizes! The initial reward for winning a round is a special title!
You will also receive a reward each time you beat a new team for the first time.
Rewards for winning first will stack, so always try to stay in first place!
Furthermore, there is a special title reserved only for those powerful enough to defeat every team that we offer!
Finally, there are rewards for teams who defeat enemies in the least amount of turns, so try to keep the fluff to a minimum!
First focus on defeating teams one by one, then try to decrease the amount of turns it takes you to win!

Allow me to explain the rules of participating in War Fan Tasm!
The rules are simple: fight the opposing team until they are knocked out, or until you are knocked out. The team who is still standing wins!
Your HP and MP will be restored before each fight even if you are KO'd. But your tension will start at zero.
Some effects from outside will not follow you into the arena such as the bungee jump at Gert Strait.
Also, the effects of any poison or curse will be removed between rounds.
During battle you may use tools at will, including food and cooking items.
Your moves in battle are counted, the fewer moves you make to win, the more successful you will be.
That's the whole spiel. Now go out there and show the world what you can do!

Customers...! W-Why, if it isn't {pc}! We've been waiting for you!
I'm pleased to announce that we are holding a special tournament for experienced adventurers!
We're calling it: 'The War Fan Tasm Remembrance Tourney!'
A special source has provided us with a machine which can analyze the memories of our contestants.
It allows us to materialize enemies from your memory in an instant!
Our audience will witness a spectacle of powerful adventurers versus their most fearsome foes!
For those who have just joined us, we will be pitting our competitors against foes drawn from their memories. How exciting!
There will be no fee to participate in this specific tournament.
As long as you fight like you never have before, the audience will be satisfied.
And when you have won and claimed the title of champion for yourself, please join us for...
A price ceremony featuring none other than Luckland Island owner, Mr. Golek himself!
By the way, the only opponents in this tournament will be created from your memories.
And therefore how could anyone possibly know what kind of power they might possess until they face them in the ring!
They could be much stronger than the real version the memory was based on... Isn't that the way it usually works...?
Now, after that long introduction, let's begin the War Fan Tasm. Everyone show the world how strong you really are!
